r.s: Provides classes to create and decode mime messages.
r.d: Provides classes to deal with creation and manipulation of mime messages.
r.n: * Fix Bug #9722: _quotedPrintableEncode does not encode dot at start of line on Windows platform [cipri] * Fix Bug #9725: multipart/related & alternative wrong order [cipri] * Fix Bug #10146: mbstring fails to recognize encodings. [cipri] * Fix Bug #10158: Inline images not displayed on Mozilla Thunderbird [cipri] * Fix Bug #10298: Mail_mime, double Quotes and Specialchars in from and to Adress [cipri] * Fix Bug #10306: Strings with Double Quotes get encoded wrongly [cipri] * Fix Bug #10596: Incorrect handling of text and html '0' bodies [cipri]
